languages.text: Проповеди преподобного Зирмена воодушевляют экипаж всеми силами защищать родной корабль и с особым тщанием прислуживать духам машин, поддерживающим его благословенные щиты.
The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.
languages.original_text: Проповеди преподобного Зирмена воодушевляют экипаж всеми силами защищать родной корабль и с особым тщанием прислуживать духам машин, поддерживающим его благословенные щиты.

traits.locale_text: The sermons of Reverend Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

languages.text: Die Predigten von Konfessor Zirmen habe die Crew dazu inspiriert, das Schiff mit aller Macht zu verteidigen und den Maschinengeistern mit größerer Hingabe zu dienen, die seine gesegneten Schilde nähren.
languages.original_text: The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

traits.locale_text: Die Predigten von Konfessor Zirmen habe die Crew dazu inspiriert, das Schiff mit aller Macht zu verteidigen und den Maschinengeistern mit größerer Hingabe zu dienen, die seine gesegneten Schilde nähren.

languages.text: Los sermones del confesor Zirmen han inspirado a la tripulación para defender la nave con todas sus fuerzas y entregarse al máximo para apaciguar a los espíritus máquina que sostienen sus benditos escudos.
languages.original_text: The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

traits.locale_text: Los sermones del confesor Zirmen han inspirado a la tripulación para defender la nave con todas sus fuerzas y entregarse al máximo para apaciguar a los espíritus máquina que sostienen sus benditos escudos.

languages.text: 聴罪師ジルメンの説法は、クルーに全力で船を守り、その祝福された盾を支える機械精霊に奉仕するために、より一層の努力を傾けようと、やる気を出させた。
languages.original_text: The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

traits.locale_text: 聴罪師ジルメンの説法は、クルーに全力で船を守り、その祝福された盾を支える機械精霊に奉仕するために、より一層の努力を傾けようと、やる気を出させた。

languages.text: 告解神父齐曼的布道鼓舞了全体船员，所有人都愿竭尽全力守护好这艘船，付诸一切努力守护神圣护盾的机魂。
languages.original_text: The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

traits.locale_text: 告解神父齐曼的布道鼓舞了全体船员，所有人都愿竭尽全力守护好这艘船，付诸一切努力守护神圣护盾的机魂。

languages.text: Les sermons du confesseur Zirmen ont incité l'équipage à défendre le vaisseau de toutes ses forces et à redoubler d'efforts pour prendre soin des esprits de la machine qui alimentent ses boucliers sacrés.
languages.original_text: The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.

traits.locale_text: Les sermons du confesseur Zirmen ont incité l'équipage à défendre le vaisseau de toutes ses forces et à redoubler d'efforts pour prendre soin des esprits de la machine qui alimentent ses boucliers sacrés.

languages.text: Günah Çıkarıcı Zirmen'in vaazları, mürettebata gemiyi tüm kudretleriyle korumaları ve onun kutsal kalkanlarını ayakta tutan makine ruhlarına hizmet etmek üzere daha büyük efor sarf etmeleri konusunda ilham verdi.
languages.original_text: The sermons of Confessor Zirmen have inspired the crew to defend the vessel with all their might and devote greater efforts to serving the machine spirits that sustain its blessed shields.
